calculateRidersRankInCheckpoints() - Method in class cycling.Checkpoint
Method that calculates all the riders' ranks that they achieved in the checkpoint by the finish times that they achieved during the race, sorted with the winner (fastest time) being the first in the array.
calculateRidersRankInStage() - Method in class cycling.Stage
Methods that finds and calculates all of the riders' ranks sorted based on their finish time in the stage, with the winner (1st place) being the fastest.
calculateRidersRankInStage() - Method in interface cycling.StageInterface
Methods that finds and calculates all of the riders' ranks sorted based on their finish time in the stage, with the winner (1st place) being the fastest.
calculateRidersTotalElapsedTime(int) - Method in class cycling.Rider
Method that calculates the rider's total elapsed time from the stage enquired by finding the sum of all the checkpoint times.
calculateRidersTotalMountainPoints() - Method in class cycling.Rider
Method that calculates the total amount of mountain points that the rider gains from the all the checkpoints within the race.
